timeline.bodyText: S2111 is not converted into {rule:java:S2111} by rule-api if there's no space before the . 😣
timeline.author: alban-auzeill
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -25,5 +25,5 @@

Compliant Solution

Exceptions

BigDecimal constructor with double argument is ignored as using valueOf instead might change resulting -value. See {rule:java:S2111}.

+value. See {rule:java:S2111} .

timeline.bodyText: It seems that Eric is reworking this rule (SONARJAVA-3376), it requires some change in the rule, I believe we should not update the json and HTML now.
timeline.author: quentin-jaquier-sonarsource
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,6 +1,6 @@
 {
-  "title": "\"@RequestMapping\" methods should specify HTTP method",
-  "type": "VULNERABILITY",
+  "title": "Allowing both safe and unsafe HTTP methods is security-sensitive",
